overview:
Bill Kish has started technology companies since 1980. Bill starts companies from concept and funds the venture through investment alternatives. His strengths are staying with a project, open to change, identifying talented individuals and providing the talent with opportunity and financial resources.

Recently, he founded Joynin, (formerly Asked Out Inc) a social commerce platform company. He serves as the company’s Chairman and CFO. The original business model for Joynin was created from a 10 year old business model patent application.

Bill has worked with top tier financial institutions, his start up companies have been funded by major venture capital groups and with public companies.
